Uses of Class
org.springframework.shell.standard.ShellComponent

  • Packages that use ShellComponent 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.shell.standard.commands
    Contains default commands that ought to apply to each shell app.

    • Uses of ShellComponent in org.springframework.shell.standard.commands

      Classes in org.springframework.shell.standard.commands with annotations of type ShellComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Clear
      ANSI console related commands.
      class  Help
      A command to display help about all available commands.
      class  History
      A command that displays all previously run commands, optionally dumping to a file readable by Script.
      class  Quit
      A command that terminates the running shell.
      class  Script
      A command that can read and execute other commands from a file.
      class  Stacktrace
      A command to display the full stacktrace when an error occurs.
